about_the_game:
Try out Colorway Antics for free! Unleash your creativity as you go spelunking in the depths of the cave. Fly freely, paint with brushes or splatter with paintballs. Endless colors and discoveries await as you get a sneak peek into creating a masterpiece with the world around you. Explore more worlds to color and purchase the full version of Colorway Antics, available now!

================================

Colorway Antics is the ultimate VR coloring game that unlocks boundless fun and creative expression. Immerse yourself in a world of possibilities as you explore unique, paintable scenes, waiting to be transformed with your unique style. Fly freely through hideouts, chaotic bedrooms, treehouses, zombie-infested parks, outer space, and mystical caves, unlocking the power of your imagination.

Unleash your artistic genius with intuitive painting tools that guarantee captivating entertainment. Use versatile paint brushes to add intricate details and unleash your inner maestro. Cover large areas using vibrant colors with the fill tool and experience the thrill of splattering creativity with paintballs. Or dive into using the sticker tool, brimming with graffiti-style graphics that add an artistic flair to your masterpieces. Each tool in Colorway Antics opens up possibilities for artistic expression and allows you to paint the world in exciting ways!

Immerse yourself in captivating environments and make them your own. Explore hideouts, transform bedrooms into vibrant havens, unleash your creativity upon zombies in a park, journey through outer space, or uncover mysteries in caves. Unleash your imagination and leave your artistic mark. Enjoy endless hours of creative exploration.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR: Oculus Touch/Valve Index/HTC Vive. OpenXR: Requires motion controllers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070/Quadro P5000 equivalent or better, AMD Radeon Vega 56 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus Touch/Valve Index/HTC Vive
